mainSection.subheading: Choose the membership that suits your needs
mainSection.heading: BECOME A MEMBER AT ZEN FITNESS

accordionData.title: Can I contact someone before signing up?
content: Do you wish to talk to someone before taking your decision?
Take contact with one of our highly competent employees; 116 123.
Not feeling like talking to someone? Send us an email; zenfitness@support.com
One of our employees will help you with whatever you're wondering about and inform you of the best possible plans suiting your needs.

accordionData.title: Is there a drop-in option?
content: Of course! The drop-in fee is 200,- and gives you access to:
<ul>
• Self-training in the studio
• Access to the swimming facility
• Pay for drop-in at the center's reception (valid ONLY for the current day).
If you wish to become a member within the next 30 days, we will refund the drop-in fee. Please send a picture of the receipt to customer service.

accordionData.title: Is there an age limit at Zen Fitness?
content: What are the age limits at Zen Fitness?
The age limit to become a member at SATS is from the age of 11. If you are between 11-14 years old, you must train with a guardian.
From the year you turn 15, you will be able to train alone at our centers.
If you are under 18 years old, you must have a guardian accompany you to the center to sign the contract and act as the responsible payer.

accordionData.title: Are there any discounts?
content: We offer various discount agreements on our memberships. The different agreements we offer are:
<ul>
• Student discount - 20%
• Senior discount - 20%
• Corporate discount
Note: You will not be able to register a discount on Premium Plans or register two different discounts.
In case of a guardian, you must have a membership at Zen Fitness.
